mapper.select: SELECT no,title, img, content, regdate, ribbonItem, memberNo, status, rcpsAvg, viewCount, scrapCount, nickname, profileImg, itemCount FROM( SELECT no,title, img, content, regdate, ribbonItem, memberNo, status, rcpsAvg, viewCount, scrapCount, nickname, profileImg, itemCount, rownum r FROM ( SELECT r.no, title, img, content, r.regdate, ribbon_item ribbonItem, member_no memberNo, status, rcps_avg rcpsAvg, view_count viewCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM rcps_saved WHERE recipe_no= r.no) scrapCount,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rcp_items WHERE recipe_no=r.no) itemCount, nickname , profile_img profileImg FROM RCPS r, members m WHERE r.member_no= m.no ORDER BY r.regdate DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RCPS WHERE status='c'

SELECT rcps.no no, rcps.title title, rcps.img img, rcps.ribbon_item ribbonItem, rcps.member_no memberNo, m.nickname nickname, m.profile_img profileImg FROM rcps, members m WHERE rcps.member_no = m.no AND rcps.status='c' AND m.no = #{memberNo}
SELECT no, title, img FROM rcps WHERE status='w' AND member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY no

SELECT r.no, title, img, content, r.regdate, ribbon_item ribbonItem, member_no memberNo, m.profile_img,m.nickname, (SELECT SUM(price) FROM rcp_items WHERE recipe_no = #{no}) price, rcps_avg rcpsAvg, view_count viewCount FROM rcps r, members m WHERE r.member_no = m.no AND r.no = #{no}

SELECT r.no no, r.title title, r.img img, r.ribbon_item ribbonItem, r.rcps_avg rcpsAvg, r.view_count viewCount, m.no memberNo, m.nickname nickname, m.profile_img profileImg FROM rcps r, members m, rcps_saved s WHERE r.no = s.recipe_no AND m.no = r.member_no AND s.member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY title
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT s.member_no) scrapCount FROM rcps_saved s, rcps r WHERE r.no = s.recipe_no AND s.recipe_no = #{no}
